CHAT.comment: FEDERAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION,ET AL., Petitioners v. AT&T INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:18 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANTHONY A. YANG ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEOFFREY M. KLINEBERG ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ANTHONY A. YANG ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:07 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
